__e: But... you know, what bothers me most is that I may actually be okay with it.
It doesn't bother me at all that you have it, and my dad has psoriasis, so I get it.
I want you to know that it doesn't bother me at all.
I don't care if this place blocks the signal or not.
Does it bother you that he spent all that time in the joint?
Peter, it doesn't bother you that you have the wrong guy out on bail, awaiting trial for murder?
I don't mind people. I just like to see 'em coming.
Oh, however... You wouldn't mind if my men took a look around, would you?
- But there's something about that shot. It just doesn't look right.
I know I just said we all need our secrets, but if you don't mind me asking, what do you like to do at the dungeon?
Can I ask a favor of you? Please tell that gentleman that the church is closed for rehearsal.
No, what bothers me is I don't have any idea what the hell you are.
Something about him bugs me, and you know what I like to do when that happens?
